sentences.sContent: After all, your competitors are financially rational.
sentences.sContent_eng: After all, your competitors are financially rational.
sentences.sCn: 至少你的对手财政上是理性的。

sentences.sContent: And you have to find a way to support yourself financially while you follow your passion.
sentences.sContent_eng: And you have to find a way to support yourself financially while you follow your passion.
sentences.sCn: 并且当你跟着你的激情走时，你必须找到一个办法在财政上支持你自己。

sentences.sContent: And I know it at Princeton, when you came, the Steve Forbes decided to no longer support the university financially. There have been protests at some of your talks.
sentences.sContent_eng: And I know it at Princeton, when you came, the Steve Forbes decided to no longer support the university financially. There have been protests at some of your talks.
sentences.sCn: 我知道当您刚刚来到普林斯顿大学的时候，福布斯集团决定不再支持,大学的财政开支，那时，有一些人,在您的讲座上抗议。

words.tran: 筹措资金；财政管理；从事金融活动（finance的ing形式）
欺骗；从事欺骗性金融活动
